description: ![samsung galaxys5]()### Alexa’s new whisper mode rolls out in US today – here’s how to enable it](https://www.trustedreviews.com/news/how-to-enable-alexa-whisper-mode-echo-3607478 "Alexa’s new whisper mode rolls out in US today – here’s how toenable it")  * **Related:** [Samsung wants to boost BlackBerry alliance, not buyit](https://www.trustedreviews.com/news/samsung-claims-it-wants-to-boost-partnership-with-blackberry-not-buy-it)Both S6-stamped devices are tipped for a March launch, likely entering tech-dom at this year’s Mobile World Congress event over in Barcelona.MWC runs from March 2 to 5, and is sure to see some of this year’s hottestflagship smartphones and tablets debut.The [Sony Xperia Z4](https://www.trustedreviews.com/news/sony-xperia-z4-release-date-rumours-news-specs-and-price), the [LGG4](https://www.trustedreviews.com/news/lg-g4-release-date-rumours-news-specs-and-price), and the [HTC One M9‘Hima’](https://www.trustedreviews.com/news/htc-one-m9-release-date-rumours-news-specs-and-price) have all been rumoured to make an appearance at MWC2015.
